document_data.caption: A map showing the Bountiful Shoals between Maribar Island and Sikak.
document_data.name: Bountiful Shoals
document_data.mainbody: The '''Bountiful Shoals''' was a large coral reef found in the [[Golden Gulf]] offshore from the northern [[Pearl Cities]] of [[west Zakhara]].
document_data.Geography: The reef stretched parallel to the shore in a diagonal pattern for roughly {{SI|135|mi|k|long=yes}}, separating [[Maribar Island]] from the Pearl Cities and the city of [[Sikak]] specifically. The Bountiful Shoals, combined with other rocky shoals and hidden sand banks, made the channel between Maribar Island and the mainland a treacherous passage for ships.
